fullText: This is the most joyously entertaining new musical to hit Broadway in years, a smart, irreverent and fabulously well-crafted show that manages to mock organized religion while celebrating the genuine faith that drives believers.
dtliExcerpt: This is the most joyously entertaining new musical to hit Broadway in years, a smart, irreverent and fabulously well-crafted show that manages to mock organized religion while celebrating the genuine faith that drives believers.
